DOC.brief_summary: The START study implement osteoarthritis ( OA ) treatment recommendation increase use recommend treatment modality reduce non-desired event ( e.g . unnecessary referral secondary care , unnecessary use costly image modality use treatment modality support low quality evidence ) . The purpose STavanger osteoARThritis ( START ) study improve quality OA care increase collaboration health care professional primary health care across health care level .
DOC.detailed_description: Previous research show osteoarthritis care person hip knee osteoarthritis Norway potential improvement provide care may necessarily reflect evidence-based guideline recommendation . The purpose STavanger osteoARThritis ( START ) study improve quality OA care increase collaboration health care professional primary health care across health care level . Based international treatment recommendation OA care previous research , tailor implementation strategy target high quality , integrate care people OA Stavanger Municipality develop , implement evaluate . The care mainly provide Stavanger primary health care service physiotherapist ( PT ) ( private practice ) general practitioner ( GP ) , also include collaboration orthopaedic surgeon specialist health care Stavanger University Hospital . The main aim present study develop , implement evaluate effect tailor implementation strategy START study Stavanger Municipality . To evaluate effect START implementation strategy , interrupted time series design method apply . The study period divide three phase : pre-implementation , implementation/transition post-implementation . Data collect 16 time point ; 8 8 implementation/ transition phase .
